item.title: spring boot + spring data mongoDB + spring data rest
item.description: 使用spring framework來建立server-api app, spring boot + spring data mongoDB + spring data rest Table of contents Table of contents 1. create POM file 2. create Domain class 3. create DAO interface 4. create app entry 5. configure Repository Rest Configuration 1. create

Deploy a MongoDB step Launch a mongoDB create db create collection Launch a mongoDB docker run --name mongo -d -p 27017:27017 -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=mongo -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=secret mongo:3 --smallfiles create db
